reviews.review: The perfect game. I don't really need to say much past that. Gameplay is good, story is good, puzzles are good, really smooth portal mechanics and just really cool over all. Buy the game.

An eerie soundtrack and some mind bending gameplay! A must-have for the PC.
A fantastic sequel.  If you like games and have a decent sense of humor you will love this game.  If you dont have it just buy.

i repent that i didn't played it earlier. It's calming, challenging and fricking funny :D

And that after just 3,5 hours of gameplay lol!
This game is by far the most amazing game I have ever played in my entire lifetime. It's truly honestly an absolute master piece.

The best puzzle game I've ever played!
The puzzles are pretty easy, but this doesn't dilute the satisfaction of playing this game!
The graphics, narration are on spot, making the experience really enjoyable
This is still a great competitor to modern puzzle games, even to this day!

You start playing for the puzzles, but keep playing for the storyline
10/10
i like to play with portals
Portal 2 is a really good game,even better then portal 1 in my opinion.
i mean i'm sure terraria is great but cmon let's not go crazy here portal 2 is the best game ever made send tweet
one of my favorite games of all time
The king of puzzle games. It's not that long, puzzles are always challenging in a good way and the story is hilarious. Also the coop mode is very fun.
One of my most favourite games. You can‚Äôt miss this classic!

Just binged Portal and Portal 2 over the last couple of days. I'd only seen let's plays, and heard about it from friends. Now I see what the hype is about! Amazing game. Tough puzzles, good story-line, 10 out of 10!
I am struggling to 100% this....I like it

I just realized I never reviewed my favorite game of all time which is kinda funny but here's your review everyone, if somehow you havent heard of or played portal 1 and or 2 than OH BOY I envy you because I'd give up so much to be able to play through these games blind again this is not only the best puzzle game to be made but it has the extra good stuff like A co-op mode and a WORKSHOP yes that means it can have I N F I N I T E potential and plus there are even more mods that exist to make more stuff man I love this game
I'm here to leave a positive review on this gaming titan, it's high time. Amazing puzzle game and holds up extremely well. Portal 3 when?
Really enjoyed it, hours of fun even after you've finished the story, plus you can play with friends.
This game is a treasure, we must protect it at all costs.
